name: Republic of Abkhazia
status: Claimed as an autonomous republic of Georgia.
recognition: Recognized by five UN member states.

name: Republic of Artsakh
status: Claimed as part of Azerbaijan. De facto independent state.

name: Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus
status: Claimed as part of the Republic of Cyprus.

name: Republic of South Ossetia
recognition: Recognized by five UN member states.

name: Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic
status: Claimed as a territorial unit of Moldova. De facto independent state.
